metadata.title: CVE-2023-4630 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from10.6 before 16.1.5, all versions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.5, allversions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.1 in which any user can readlimited information about any project's imports.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
